name: A Pizza the Action
description:
Mama Nova’s is one the hottest pizza joint in the system thanks to synthchips. These synthetic Foodiscs™ let her replicate any flavor -- except the illegal ones, of course. (Doing so will void your warranty.)

A Pizza the Action is a system-agnostic role-playing supplement created for the 2018 One Page Dungeon Contest. Anna wrote it and did layout stuff and Beatrix illustrated it. Some DLC is included to the right!
